action.action-desc: Mr. Jolly submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the Committee on Rules

form.official-title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to require that the House be in session at least 40 hours each week other than a week that is designated as a district work period.

section.text: That rule XIV is amended by adding at the end the following new clause:

rules-paragraph.text: Except as provided by paragraph (b), the House shall be in session at least 40 hours each week other than a week that is designated as a district work period.

In any week in which a legal holiday occurs, other than a week that is designated as a district work period, the House shall be in session at least 8 hours per day for the remaining days of such week.
